name: White Rose (demo)
description:
WARNING!

Game may contain serious subjects and visuals that may upset some viewers.

Viewer discretion is advised.

What happens when you lose your loved one in a tragic accident? Don't let the beautiful white rose inside you wilt.

HELLO PLAYER!

This demo is for a game called white Rose. The main character of this game is a  cute dog {named Rose}. I hope you enjoy this game demo and stay around for the finished game.

This game demo contains one chapter. The finished version will contain at least 5-10 chapters. Depends on how much people like the demo.

Keep in mind:
1. I am 14 years old so don't use any rude or cursing words while speaking, replying or advising me.
2. Your critique is highly appreciated. Please give me tips and advice so that i can improve myself.
3. I am not a native english speaker. English is not my national language cause i am indian. If you spot any spelling and/or 
   grammer mistakes please inform me.
4. This the demo of my first (technically third but the previous ones include a digital poem book and a powerpoint game.) game so i appologize for my lack of experience in coding and other stuff.

THANK YOU!
